dict.string: Are you hungry? // I'm hungry. / I'm not hungry.
Kaakpiich? // Kaaliqsuŋa. / Kaaŋitchuŋa.
Are you hot? // I'm hot. / I'm not hot.
Uunniqiviich? // Uunniqiruŋa. / Uunniqiŋitchuŋa.
Do you have a stomachache? // I have a stomachache. / I don't have a stomachache.
Narraanŋuviich? // Narraanŋuruŋa. / Narraanŋuŋitchuŋa.
Are you lonely? // I'm lonely. / I'm not lonely.
Alianniuqpiich? // Alianniuqtuŋa. / Alianniuŋitchuŋa.
Are you happy? // I'm happy. / I'm not happy.
Quviasukpiich? // Quviasuktuŋa. / Quviasuŋitchuŋa.
Are you homesick? // I'm homesick. / I'm not homesick.
Aisuliqpiich? // Aisuliqsuŋa. / Aisuliŋitchuŋa.
Do you want to eat? // I want to eat. / I don't want to eat.
Niġisuliqpiich? // Niġisuliqsuŋa. / Niġisuŋitchuŋa.
Are you sleepy? // I'm sleepy. / I'm not sleepy.
Uiñġaliqpiich? // Uiñġaliqsŋa. / Uiñġaŋitchuŋa.
Are you tired? // I'm tired. / I'm not tired.
Minġuqpiich? // Minġuqtuŋa. / Minġuŋitchuŋa.
Are you sick? // I'm sick. / I'm not sick.
Atniġñaqpiich? // Atniġñaqtuŋa. / Atniġñaŋitchuŋa.
Do you have a headache? // I have a headache. / I don't have a headache.
Niaqunŋuviich? // Niaqunŋuruŋa. / Niaqunŋuŋitchuŋa.
Do you want a hot drink? // I want a hot drink. / I don't want a hot drink.
Yuuqqaġukpiich? // Yuuqqaġuktuŋa. / Yuuqqaġuŋitchuŋa.
Are you cold? // I'm cold. / I'm not cold.
Qiunŋuviich? // Qiunŋuruŋa. / Qiunŋuŋnitchuŋa.
Are your feet cold? // My feet are cold. / My feet are not cold.
Isigaiyaqpatiin? // Isigaiyaġaaŋa./ Isigaiyaŋitkaaŋa.
